thread.title: LISTEN: The Chainsmokers, Coldplay drop ‘surprise’ single
thread.title_full: LISTEN: The Chainsmokers, Coldplay drop ‘surprise’ single

author: gcatolico
title: LISTEN: The Chainsmokers, Coldplay drop ‘surprise’ single
text:
— BRIT Awards (@BRITs) February 23, 2017 
“Something Just Like This” may ring a bell to many as the track’s beat is reminiscent of The Chainsmokers’ other EDM-pop hit “Roses.” A debut album is coming in the way for the duo, which will include “Paris,” “Something Just Like This” and 10 other new singles. 
In fact, Martin tweeted his thrill for the duo’s debut album. “Excited for The Chainsmokers’ album. I’ve heard some songs and I love them,” Martin said last month. excited for @thechainsmokers ' album; I've heard some songs and I love them. cm READ: After hit streak, dance duo The Chainsmokers plan album 
Meanwhile, Coldplay announced that they will drop an extended play called “Kaleidoscope,” a follow-up to their 2015 album “A Head Full of Dreams.” As one of their stopovers of their Asian tour, Coldplay will soon play sweet music to their Filipino fans on April 4 at the SM Mall of Asia Concert Grounds. Gianna Francesca Catolico / ra RELATED STORIES
